articleBody:
I work primarily in Node and React to build robust software with intuitive user interfaces. Thus far, I have built 10+ web applications such as the Bare Home ecommerce site and my own website. My marketing background combined with my design prowess has allowed me to center customer needs in the development process.

Tech Stack:
JavaScript ES6+, React, Node, CSS3, HTML5, SQL, MySQL, GitHub, Express, jQuery, Bootstrap
